metadata.description: Narumi's plugin marketplace for development tools

plugins.name: python-code-quality
plugins.description: Python code quality hooks: auto-format with ruff, lint with ruff check, and type check with ty

plugins.name: python-skills
plugins.description: Comprehensive Python development toolkit: project workflow and standards (uv, ruff, pytest, ty, typer, loguru) and Peewee ORM patterns with DatabaseProxy. Use for Python 3.12+ project setup, dependency management, testing, type checking, CLI development, logging, and database ORM patterns.

plugins.name: slides-skills
plugins.description: Complete Marp/Marpit presentation toolkit: write slides with Marpit-compatible Markdown and create slide-ready SVG illustrations optimized for HTML export. Includes slide structure, frontmatter, themes, directives, layout patterns, SVG authoring with smart sizing, and embedding best practices.
